data.title: Apex Agenda
data.description: A user based task management web applications with categorization, deadlines. Tasks with due date automatically gets added to today list

data.title: Parch
data.description: Note Taking application with authentication and automatic saves. Built with TipTap editor for rich text editing experience. Supports headings, lists, colors, justification and more. Notes are searchanble based on both title and content.
